title: Molecule query results
description: Query the ATB server database for molecules based on molecule meta-data

atb_api_token.description: ATB server API token required for communication

iupac.description: The official IUPAC name of the  molecule

inchi_key.description: The unique InChI code of the molecule

common_name.description: The common name of the molecule

curation_trust.description: level of expected accuracy of the molecule parameters as string of comma seperated integers. -1 = unfinished ATB molecule, 0 = finished ATB molecule, 1 = manual parameters from reliable users, 2 = manual parameters from official source

is_finished.description: Are calculations for the molecule still running

user_label.description: Any user specific label that may have been given to the molecule

match_partial.description: Enable partial matching of string attributes
